row.title: RAS Dialogue
row.field_page_description: Post comments, ask questions, share information, and stay up-to-date with expert Rasologists.
row.field_feature_card_description: Post comments, ask questions, and share information with RAS experts.
row.field_about_blog: Join the discussion! Post comments, ask questions, and share information with RAS experts. Subscribe to receive notifications when a new RAS Dialogue article is posted.

row.title: Cancer Currents: An NCI Cancer Research Blog
row.field_page_description: Cancer Currents blog providing news and research updates from the National Cancer Institute
row.field_feature_card_description: Stay current with cancer research news, updates on NCI programs, and more. Selected posts also in Spanish.
row.field_list_description: News and research updates from the National Cancer Institute
row.field_browser_title: Cancer Currents: An NCI Cancer Research Blog
row.field_about_blog: A blog featuring news and research updates from the National Cancer Institute.

row.title: CCG Updates and Insights
row.field_page_description: Read interviews with investigators, updates from CCG's Director and others, CCG's latest news and announcements, and overviews of new influential papers in cancer genomics.
row.field_feature_card_description: Read interviews with investigators, updates from CCG's Director and others, CCG's latest news and announcements, and overviews of new influential papers in cancer genomics.
row.field_browser_title: Updates & Insights Blog - Center for Cancer Genomics
row.field_about_blog: Featuring current topics in cancer genomics research and news and updates from CCG.

row.title: CRCHD Dialogue on Disparities
row.field_page_description: Blog from CRCHD. Stay up-to-date with cancer health disparities issues and read CRCHD spotlights on promising research findings and program updates.
row.field_feature_card_description: Follow the blog to learn more about National Minority Health Month 2019, stay up to date on cancer health disparities issues, read spotlights on promising projects and researchers, and more.
row.field_list_description: Follow the blog to learn more about National Minority Health Month 2019, stay up to date on cancer health disparities issues, read spotlights on promising projects and researchers, and more.
row.field_about_blog: Find the latest updates, spotlights, and news from CRCHD.

row.title: CGH Spotlight Blog
row.field_page_description: Stay up-to-date with the latest information and news from CGH and the global health communities.
row.field_feature_card_description: Stay up-to-date with the latest information and news from CGH and the global health communities.
row.field_about_blog: This blog features content and images to showcase the great work from the Center for Global Health.
